newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Sept 17.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Sept 17.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following items on the front page of its business section on Sept. 17:
WASHINGTON - Crestar Financial Corp. of Richmond agreed to acquire Citizens Bancorp of Laurel for $774 million.
WASHINGTON - Income and interests make seniors and soon-to-be-seniors a force to be reckoned with in the marketplace.
WASHINGTON - The United Auto Workers union and Ford Motor Co. reached tenative agreement on a new three-year contract establishing the first minimum staffing requirements in auto industry history.

WASHINGTON - The National Transportation Safety Board will recommend that passenger-side airbags deploy at a slower speed, in light of growing evidence that airbags can inflate with enough force to kill small children and some adults.
